{{{
$ cd repository

$ git checkout --orphan gh-pages
# Creates our branch, without any parents (it's an orphan!)
# Switched to a new branch 'gh-pages'

$ git rm -rf .
# Remove all files from the old working tree
# rm '.gitignore'
